author: Karissa Bell
title: Facebook's lack of moderators is hurting its fight against misinformation
description: Facebook has taken a number of steps meant to curb the spread of coronavirus misinformation, yet the company’s shortage of human moderators has left some major gaps in its ability to enforce its policies.Consumer Reports successfully bought a number...
content: Facebook has previously warned that it’s been unable to rely on many of its human content moderators, most of whom are contractors and not able to work from home, due to the coronavirus pandemic. Instead, the company has been relying heavily on its automated … [+2189 chars]
